{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX6100 |revision=-100NAS |upc=606449148701 |asin=B00HHRP11C;GB;,B00HHRP11C;US;, |fcc_date=11/19/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H268 |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY313200231 |ic_id=4054A-13200231 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.21 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1312-BMTH, CTPPF635; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1312-BMTH, CTPPF635; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E;MT7610EN, 1311-AMAL, DTPNV753; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E;RTL8211E, CAC64P3, GC52B; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;1; |flags=DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|AC750 WiFi Range Extender}} :[http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX6100.aspx Product page]
"U12H268T10", "801497", and "REV. 0 GP" appears to :be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA55243|07/07/2014}}
